bill_title: revise provisions and requirements relating to certain environmental complaints.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise provisions and requirements relating to certain environmental complaints. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 34A-2-111 be amended to read as follows: 34A-2-111. No inspection or other action pursuant to § 34A-2-40, 34A-2-44, or 34A-2-45 that is based on, or is the result of, a complaint or the provision of information by a member of the general public may be carried out unless the person making the complaint or providing the information signs a complaint. The complaint shall remain confidential with the board and the secretary. The Department of Environment and Natural Resources shall conduct an on-site inspection within forty-eight hours of receiving the complaint. The department shall inform the complainant of the status of the complaint within forty-eight hours of the inspection. 170 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.098 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
